original_text: The hand of the Lord was upon me, and carried me out in the spirit of the Lord, and set me down in the midst of the valley which was full of bones,
korean_text: 여호와께서 권능으로 내게 임재하시고 그의 영으로 나를 데리고 가서 골짜기 가운데 두셨는데 거기 뼈가 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: The hand of the Lord was upon me
and carried me out in spirit of the Lord
and set me down in midst of the valley
